doc:
Lou Antonio https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lou_Antonio 0 Louis Demetrios "Lou" Antonio (born January 23, 1934) is an American actor and TV director best known for performing in the films Cool Hand Luke and America America. He also starred in two short-lived TV series, Dog and Cat, and Makin' It. Louis_Demetrios_"_Lou_"_Antonio ( born January_23_,_1934 ) is an_American_actor_and_TV_director best_known for performing in the_films Cool_Hand_Luke and America_America . He also starred in two_short-lived_TV_series_,_Dog_and_Cat , and Makin '_It .
